tasks.task_description: Create .gitignore file to exclude node_modules, dist, .env, and AWS deployment artifacts
Set up frontend project structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files
Implement Riot Games-inspired UI design with gold/blue theme and animations
Create Riot Games API integration for summoner data retrieval
Implement secure API key management using AWS Secrets Manager
Set up AWS CDK infrastructure with S3, CloudFront, and Amplify
Configure S3 bucket with proper security (private bucket, OAI access)
Set up CloudFront distribution with HTTPS enforcement and caching
Configure AWS Amplify for CI/CD with GitHub integration
Implement error handling and input validation for security
Add responsive design for mobile-first approach
Create interactive elements and creative CSS animations
Implement client-side caching and rate limiting
Add comprehensive logging and monitoring (CloudWatch)
Configure proper IAM roles and policies (least privilege)
Implement cost optimization strategies (Free Tier compliance)
Add performance optimizations (compression, minification)
Create deployment scripts and documentation
Test cross-region functionality and error scenarios
Commit all files to GitHub repository with proper commit messages

description: Rift Rewind - League of Legends Player Insights: Complete implementation with AWS best practices and Well-Architected Framework principles
context: Created .gitignore file with comprehensive exclusions for node_modules, build artifacts, environment variables, AWS deployment files, IDE files, OS files, logs, and cache directories. This follows security best practices by preventing sensitive files from being committed to version control.
